title: Security Scan Allowlist
description: Template for configuring false positive filtering in security scans. Copy this file to security-allowlist.json and customize as needed.

ExternalCommands.description: List of external commands that are safe to execute. These commands will not trigger security warnings.

SecretPatterns.description: List of regex patterns that match known-safe secret-like strings (e.g., examples, placeholders, test values). Patterns matching these will not trigger security warnings.

FilePatterns.description: List of regex patterns that match file paths that should be excluded from security scanning (e.g., test files). Files matching these patterns will not trigger security warnings.

items.description: Regular expression pattern matching file paths
